frontmatter.title: I like exploring, learning, and creating.
spotify-visual-app
frontmatter.description: A visualizer of an individual userâ€™s Spotify activity and listening trends; additionally fetches lyrics and info about artists. Developed completely on an iPad.

frontmatter.title: mei-tian
frontmatter.description: A React-Flask-based Chinese-English dictionary app. Includes HSK2.0 and HSK3.0 word lists, allows for lookup of Chinese words, showing definitions and fetching example sentences.

frontmatter.title: earth-cities
frontmatter.description: A client-side React app that displays cities by population on a world map; users can click on cities to learn more (sourced from Wikipedia).

frontmatter.title: art portfolio
frontmatter.description: A place to drop my travel photography and other art, with more art to come! This was also an educational foray into the world of Gatsby and GraphQL - I tweaked an existing Gatsby starter, had fun doing it.
